arg1.text: People who are against tv keep on saying that it causes obesity. I'm not going to go for a run and bring a book to read on the way. Studies have shown that telivision is even more stimulating than books.

People who are against tv keep on saying that it causes obesity.

I'm not going to go for a run and bring a book to read on the way. I think it is much easier to exercise watching tv then reading a book.

In gyms people do not have books infront of them, instead they have telvisions.

Studies have shown that telivision is even more stimulating than books.

arg1.author: Sahba
arg1.text: I think T.V. is more helpful as the you can watch and listen to something being explained like if we read about budding or spore formation we have to create an image about that in mind, but when we watch the animation of budding then we could understand better. Some people can't even imagine so T.V. is helpful. As concerning the time limit or harm to our eyes, we should watch T.V. in a limit, because the excess of everything is harmful, even reading of books. Surveys have found that a normal person can remember 10% of what he had read and 50% of what he had listened and watched.
arg1.originalHTML:
I think T.V. is more helpful as the you can watch and listen to something being explained like if we read about budding or spore formation we have to create an image about that in mind, but when we watch the animation of budding then we could understand better. Some people can't even imagine so T.V. is helpful. As concerning the time limit or harm to our eyes, we should watch T.V. in a limit, because the excess of everything is harmful, even reading of books.

Surveys have found that a normal person can remember 10% of what he had read and 50% of what he had listened and watched.

arg2.author: hmmo_o
